affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.
notes: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.
name: disruptor_static_storm
